start_page.title: Welcome to RLA - Path Planner
start_page.body: This application is used to generate a 'lawnmower' path for use inside Mission Planner software. Please import a polygon (.poly) file to begin path planning. Once done, the path will be displayed on the right hand side plot. If you are happy, export the path the a text (.txt) file to be used in Mission Planner.

end_page.title: Export successful!
end_page.body: Path successfully exported to '{}' in the same folder to polygon file '{}'. Path can be imported to Mission Planner. To view path plot again, use Hide/Show toggle underneath export mission.
